runs.comm: short first up and pulled out in front of square, not timed enough to go to the rope
and this is why, length ball swatted down the ground, bit of a tennis shot but mightily effective past mid off
back of a legnth length and hammered over square leg and this time it is timed well enough to get to the rope
more runs through the leg side, pulled of a fuller length past midwicket but not well enough to beat the deep fielder
around the wicket now and whipped in front of square out to the deep fielder
length and defended to cover from the crease
length and Pietersen is down the pitch trying to whip it away, gets hit on the pad
length and nudged off the back foot to cover
a step away from, and then in front of the stumps, hacked into the leg side with an attempted pull but it was too full to do so
length outside off stump and played back to the bowler
length, off the thigh guard into the leg side
length outside off, tried to be cut but it's off a bottom edge into the ground
goes full from back over the wicket and gets driven just wide of mid on for a single
Kieswetter steps away and tries to slap a length ball down the ground, on the bounce to mid on
fine delivery, sliding on past the outside edge as Kieswetter tried to open the face to third man
smashed very hard and through the fingers of extra cover. This really was belted and Misbah couldn't cling on
full length outside off, tried to be swung to leg and missed
full toss on leg stump and flicked down fine for four
step across the stumps and a flick past short long leg, excellent awareness from Pietersen
powered from a length into the off side, can only find the fielder but the fielder spills it so they take a run
well bowled, a yorker right on the spot that Kieswetter does well to big out into the leg side
full toss, hit back past the bowler but mid on does very well, Ajmal tumbling to his left to save
another great yorker, dug out once more to the 45
the yorker this time goes slightly wrong and Kieswetter gets a full toss to smash over mid on
pushed into the on side with a careful nudge
outside leg stump, tucked to square leg off the pad
step across the stumps and swept through square leg, in the gap and away for four, fine strike
down the track, dropped in short and pushed to midwicket
leg side and Pietersen misses with a paddle sweep and is very annoyed with himself for doing so, maybe it was the shot selection
flick behind square on the leg side and Gul swoops (lol!) to save at short long leg
smashed back to the bowler and Ajmal saves, that was travelling
down the wicket, played in-to-out, driven to long off
length and fast, flapped at, edged to leg
fast outside off and blazed over long off for a flat six, that is another fine strike from Pietersen

pulled out into the leg side and caught right on the rope! Straight to the man on the boundary, couldn't have been picked out any better! A yard either side and it was another maximum but Afridi has struck a major blow for Pakistan
angled in front of short third man and Bopara is through like a flash for the single
middle and off and blocked
full on off stump and played back to the bowler
now pushed to midwicket off the front foot
this time tucked just to the right of midwicket so they scramble through for a run
down the pitch, blocked back to the bowler
tried to be pulled, a bottom edge to deep square leg
<b>bowled him!<b> Kieswetter trying to step away but almost got too far away from the stumps and got bowled, missed an attempted cut, it runs onto the bails and Pakistan strike again
floated up on leg stump and pushed down to long on
full outside off and flicked to extra cover
cut to point
again only cut to point
turned from middle and off through midwicket
Bopara shaped to paddle sweep, then adjusted and dropped a ball outside off to short third man
leg side, it's a wide, missed by the keeper, Bopara screams through for an extra and is nearly run out by a direct hit
outside off, goes for the slog sweep and misses
another slog sweep and another miss, off the body into the off side
down the pitch and tucked through midwicket
a huge hit high up into the night and lands between fielders in the leg side field, wasn't the best effort from the fielders
flicked with the spin but only back to the bowler
again just flicked back to the bowler off a full length
might have been dropped by the keeper, beaten outside off nevertheless to a slider
back cut to short third man, they race through
chipped over extra cover, a useful couple
this time only to extra cover on the drive
tossed up well wide of off stump, swung at and an edge into the leg side but between midwicket and long on
length and pushed back past the bowler
tossed outside off, missed with a sweep
on the stumps, played to cover
flatter, shovelled off his legs
length, straight, chopped busily to backward point
length, worked into the leg side
dragged short, Morgan skips out and glances to deep backward square
flat, straight, punched into the gap in front of deep midwicket
on the legs, scuttles to short third man via the pad
legnth, driven to long-on
angled across the left-hander and Morgan drives uppishly past the diving Misbah at extra-cover. Half of half a chance
width and Morgan backs away, slashing aggressively through backward point
on the stumps, goes down and sweeps to long leg
length, drifting towards leg stump and squirted into the off side via an edge

and this time gottim! A heavy blow for England, who lose the top-ranked batsman in the format to another wily Hafeez delivery. It was maybe a touch quicker, full in length and the ball flew through Morgan as he shaped for an expansive drive
goes for the reverse sweep and almost sensationally caught by the fielder at short third man, who gets his fingers under the looping ball but can't cling on
tossed up, Bopara leans forward and sweeps punishly to the square boundary
outside off and tucked to backward point
flighted outside off and misses with a dab
length, outside off defended
slower bouncer and under-edged via a pull shot towards deep square leg ... It's short of the fielder and they come back for a second, Bopara surviving a review after a full length dive
full, on the pads and tucked into another gap in front of deep midwicket
shooooooooooot! Overpitched and Bopara Dick Turpins it straight back down the ground for an almighty six that thumps into the sightscreen
length delivery, angled in and chipped off the pads wide of long-on
again nurdled off the pads into the open spaces between long-on and deep midwicket ... Excellent running by the batsmen
touch short, leg-stump line, driven back on the back foot and Ajmal dives over it
tossed up, Bopara can't connect down the leg side
length, on the stumps, prodded to extra-cover and they decline a run
floated up outside leg and this time Bopara makes a firm connection with a wristy sweep shot that skims to the backward square rope
full, outside off, driven wide of long-off and the batsmen scuttle through for another couple
full, off stump and driven to long-on, slightly aerially on its way past the bowler
length, on the stumps, goes back and cuts late to point
length, angled in, hit on the knee roll outside leg stump and runs to third man for a couple
full, driven hard to extra-cover, bump ball and Misbah tries to fling down the stumps at the non-striker's end as Bopara strained to get back. Only just missed too
slower ball, Bairstow misses with a pull and it bounces over the stumps
pitched up, driven hard to long-on and this time England are denied a second
and Gul finds a way through! Bowled him, neck and crop! Bopara moved across his stumps and was defeated by a vicious, leg-stump yorker that may just have shattered England's chances
full, chopped through his legs from outside off via an inside edge
length, driven into the off side
width again and driven out towards cover
on the stumps, chopped behind point
tighter line, tickled to square leg
full toss, mishit to cover
leg side, given some air, shovelled away to deep backward square leg
full, Bairstow can't get under it and driven to long-on, well fielded to deny a second run

another for Gul! Necessity is the mother of Buttler's downfall here, the Somerset man stepping outside off and angling his bat, attempting to bounce it over the infield using the pace of the ball ... but it was a slow delivery and Buttler couldn't clear short fine leg standing inside the ring

full, swinging in and gone! Patel shuffled across, wafted a bat outside the line and was hit on the full, directly in front of off. That was a wicked delivery, ducking inside Patel's attempted stroke. And Gul's on a hat-trick
yorker, blocked out into the off side
full, straight and driven into the ground back over Gul's head
full toss, driven flat to long-off
short of a length, Bairstow misses with a heave the ball passes an inch or two over the bails
tossed up a bit more and chipped out towards deep midwicket
flat, outside off and drive hard to extra-cover, who fires in a throw to the bowler's end
doosra, pitching outside leg and Swann reverses his grip ... misses with a huge yahoo!
tossed up, again swipes at thin air as the ball skids past the stumps
leg-stump line and deflects off to short third man
slow ball, batsman fails to connect byt the batsman charge through for a run anyway as Umar misses from behind the stumps
full, hacked widly out between long-on and deep midwicket - they scramble back for two
pitched up again, can't get under the ball, crunched low down the ground
wide yorker as Swann backs away ... and he chops into the ground
full toss, swings hard, hits high up the bat and flies through extra-cover
straight, full and again hacked into the ground, out to long-on
